overview: “Johan, you’re one piece of a voyeur! You have to see dick all the time?” So asks Danny Saradon in one of Johan Paulik’s behind-the-scenes vignettes on this his directorial film debut, Johan’s Journal, Part 1: Sun Kissed. Bel Ami fans are thankful Johan is so diligently voyeuristic for he gives them the rare opportunity to experience the most gorgeous and sexiest guys around being uninhibitedly themselves. In nine groin-tingling episodes, most having already been shown in biweekly journal postings at belamionline.com, everyone will now have the opportunity to watch these lads on the big screen having fun as they grab-ass, frolic, and boink each other with fervor and enthusiasm, as only young men know how.
title: Johan's Journal: Sun Kissed
